page.title: 15GARVESTONE VILLAGE HALL
page.content:
{ The Parish Council uses the village {hall regularly.We interviewed {Mrs.Hazel Woods (the parish council {clerk) whose husband makes furniture {locally and was interviewed on Radio {Norfolk's "Village Voice". Q:What sort of things do you do? A:I write letters,keep the minutes and do any other work the councillors want me to do. Q:How long have you been going to the meetings? A:Three and a half years. Q:How many people go to the meetings? A:7 councillors and 4 public. Q:When are the meetings held? A:Every third Monday of the month.
{Note:one of the things causing concern {has been the heavy traffic (lorries {in particular) using and allegedly {damaging the roads locally.
